Uses of Class
com.github.wuic.exception.WuicException

Packages that use WuicException
com.github.wuic This package is the most general package of the WUIC library. 
com.github.wuic.engine This package contains the definition of an Engine. 
com.github.wuic.engine.impl.embedded This package contains the engines which don't delegate its work to any library like YUI Compressor. 
com.github.wuic.exception This package contains all common exceptions which could be thrown by WUIC. 
com.github.wuic.exception.wrapper This packages defines exceptions which wrap or represent a particular and common exception. 
com.github.wuic.exception.xml This package contains all exceptions related to wuic.xml path. 
com.github.wuic.plugins.maven This package provides the maven plugin support for static generation at build time.
